channel.title: Improving login on srcAllDummysRemoved
channel.description:
Hi. In this tutorial I will show you how improve the login on srcAllDummysRemoved (http://www.moparisthebest.com/downloads/srcAllDummysRemoved.tar.gz)
In client.java, search for "myUsername". You should see the following: [code=Java]myUsername = "mopar"; myPassword = "bob";[/code] in the client() method.
Change both of them so that the two strings are empty. [code=Java]myUsername = ""; myPassword = "";[/code] Compile and run your client. You will now see that "mopar" is no longer written in the login box.
You now want to find the login method. Search in client.java for "login(String s," and you should see the method. Inside the first try statement, add the following line: [code=Java]myUsername = s;[/code]
This sets the username to the one entered by the player. Compile and run your client, log into a server and then log back out. You should see that your username is remembered and you no longer need to type it in.
If you want to make the player's password remembered in the same way, add this line under the username line: [code=Java]myPassword = s2;[/code]

item.title: Improving login on srcAllDummysRemoved
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

In client.java, search for “myUsername”. You should see the following:

myUsername = "mopar"; myPassword = "bob";
in the client() method.

Change both of them so that the two strings are empty.

myUsername = ""; myPassword = "";

You now want to find the login method. Search in client.java for “login(String s,” and you should see the method.
